entry.string: Submit
entry.translation: Soobmeet

entry.string: Configure Autolinks
entry.translation: Cunffeegoore-a Ootuleenks

entry.string: Matching Rule Options
entry.translation: Metcheeng Roole-a Oopshuns

entry.string: Characters that are permitted to terminate matching words, in addition to white space
entry.translation: Cherecters thet ere-a permeetted tu termeenete-a metcheeng vurds, in eddeeshun tu vheete-a spece

entry.string: Punctuation characters
entry.translation: Poonctooeshun cherecters

entry.string: A list of XML elements within which no Autolinks are to be transformed
entry.translation: A leest ooff XML ilements veethin vheech nu Ootuleenks ere-a tu be-a trunsffurmed

entry.string: Do not match in elements
entry.translation: Du nut metch in ilements

entry.string: Treat the non-breaking space entity as a white-space character for demarcating the boundaries of key words
entry.translation: Treet zee nun-breekeeng spece-a inteety es a vheete-a-spece-a cherecter fur demerceteeng zee buoondereees ooff key vurds

entry.string: Non-breaking space entity (&nbsp;) as white space
entry.translation: Nun-breekeeng spece-a inteety (&nbsp;) es vheete-a spece

entry.string: Action Options
entry.translation: Ecshun Oopshuns

entry.string: The maximum number of times each Autolink is permitted to match a keyword in any single block of text
entry.translation: Zee mexeemoom noomber ooff teemes iech Ootuleenk is permeetted tu metch a keyvurd in uny seengle-a bluck ooff text

entry.string: Link count limit
entry.translation: Leenk cuoont leemit

entry.string: Legacy setting - default decoration style applied to Autolinks - individual links may over-ride this setting or ignore it completely
entry.translation: Legecy setteeng - deffoolt decureshun style-a eppleeed tu Ootuleenks - indeefidooel leenks mey oofer-reede-a thees setteeng oor ignure-a it cumpletely

entry.string: Autolink decoration style
entry.translation: Ootuleenk decureshun style

entry.string: Legacy setting - default new window setting for Autolinks - individual links may over-ride this setting with named windows or ignore it completely
entry.translation: Legecy setteeng - deffoolt noo veendoo setteeng fur Ootuleenks - indeefidooel leenks mey oofer-reede-a thees setteeng veet nemed veendoos oor ignure-a it cumpletely

entry.string: Open links in new window
entry.translation: Opee leenks in noo veendoo

entry.string: Flag to indicate whether errors in the execution of Autolink templates are to be shown inline with the linked keyword attempt, or hidden completely, leaving matched keywords intact - generally use this only for debugging
entry.translation: Fleg tu indeecete-a vhezeer irrurs in zee ixecooshun ooff Ootuleenk templetes ere-a tu be-a shoon inleene-a veet zee leenked keyvurd ettempt, oor heeddee cumpletely, leefeeng metched keyvurds intect - generelly use-a thees oonly fur debooggeeng

entry.string: Show template errors inline (errors shown in content)
entry.translation: Shoo templete-a irrurs inleene-a (irrurs shoon in cuntent)

entry.string: The base name for Autolink templates - this setting will form the first part of the template names
entry.translation: Zee bese-a neme-a fur Ootuleenk templetes - thees setteeng veell furm zee furst pert ooff zee templete-a nemes

entry.string: Template base name (affects all templates used)
entry.translation: Templete-a bese-a neme-a (effffects ell templetes used)

entry.string: Admin Options
entry.translation: Edmeen Oopshuns

entry.string: The maximum number of Autolinks that will be displayed at any time in the Autolink view list admin page
entry.translation: Zee mexeemoom noomber ooff Ootuleenks thet veell be-a deespleyed et uny teeme-a in zee Ootuleenk feeoo leest edmeen pege

entry.string: Items Per Page
entry.translation: Items Per Pege

entry.string: Indicates whether the sample links will be displayed in the Autolink view list admin page
entry.translation: Indeecetes vhezeer zee semple-a leenks veell be-a deespleyed in zee Ootuleenk feeoo leest edmeen pege

entry.string: Show sample links in list
entry.translation: Shoo semple-a leenks in leest
